channel.title: Stories on JuanBC - Cloud Architect
channel.description: Recent content in Stories on JuanBC - Cloud Architect

item.title: Google Cloud DNS HA
item.description: I was also able to work as a Cloud Architect in a small team, building solutions for Google to distribute to the Open Source Community. The solution was about

item.title: Google Globo
item.description: As a first experience as a Cloud Architect I was able to work in the Google Project digital migration for the Globo Television, a main player in the South America when related to Television, Broadcasting, and Entertainment.

item.title: Coca-Cola Frontend
item.description: When in Coca-Cola I’ve also had the opportunity to work with Front-end in the CMS, however for the USA Market instead of the Global Market.

item.title: Coca-Cola Global Brands
item.description: I’ve worked in CI&T for the Coca-Cola, and I’ve worked directly with the Atlanta Based client. The job was about to help markets around the world to change the content, by using an Adobe CMS: Adobe Experience Manager.
